title: Entourage, Fantasy Football, and New York Sports w/Jerry Ferrara
description:
Jerry Ferrara joins Cam Heyward to talk Entourage, Power, and New York sports. Jerry describes the long audition process for Entourage and how Mark Wahlberg helped him become “Turtle.” He also shares stories of working with athletes and celebrities like LeBron, Tom Brady, and Kanye West. Then, Cam and Hayden battle for Jerry’s college fandom as they make pitches for Ohio State and Michigan.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
